payload.content: Met with the captain; assigned to double patrols after dusk.
Noted a loose latch on the east gate. Needs fixing.
Saw the bard chatting with a cloaked stranger near the fountain.
Helped a merchant lift a fallen crate. Back twinged.
Spoke with Rurik about a report of stolen nails. He suspects the same kid.
Found muddy footprints leading toward the market stalls.
Walked the perimeter of the town square.
Cautioned a drunk peasant; he staggered off toward the tavern.
Warned a rowdy peasant to calm down.

goals.short_term: Inspect the east gate latch before nightfall
Question market vendors about petty thefts

goals.medium_term: Identify the repeat thief targeting small metal goods

goals.long_term: Earn promotion to watch-lieutenant by keeping peace consistently

goals.social: Maintain cordial relations with Rurik (blacksmith) and Lysa (bard) to get tips
